law.text: The State Fair Board shall elect annually from among the members the Governor shall appoint a chairman and a vice chairman. The board shall elect and employ a secretary who shall be responsible directly to the board as the keeper of all records pertaining to the operation of the fair or the business of the board. The president and chief executive officer provided for in KRS 247.130 shall be ex officio treasurer to the board.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 485, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 1. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 80, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4618i-4.
